30
31bool CompareProc(const ProcEntry &a, const char *b)
32{
33 return strcmp(a.first, b) < 0;
34}
35
36void ClipConfigs(const std::vector<const Config *> &filteredConfigs,
37 EGLConfig *output_configs,
38 EGLint config_size,
39 EGLint *num_config)
40{
41 EGLint result_size = static_cast<EGLint>(filteredConfigs.size());
42 if (output_configs)
43 {
44 result_size = std::max(std::min(result_size, config_size), 0);
45 for (EGLint i = 0; i < result_size; i++)
46 {
47 output_configs[i] = const_cast<Config *>(filteredConfigs[i]);
48 }
49 }
50 *num_config = result_size;
51}
52} // anonymous namespace
53
54extern "C" {
55// EGL 1.0
56EGLint EGLAPIENTRY EGL_GetError(void)
57{
58 ANGLE_SCOPED_GLOBAL_LOCK();
59 EVENT(nullptr, gl::EntryPoint::Begin, __FUNCTION__, "");
60 Thread *thread = egl::GetCurrentThread();
61
62 EGLint error = thread->getError();
63 thread->setSuccess();
64 return error;
65}
66
67EGLDisplay EGLAPIENTRY EGL_GetDisplay(EGLNativeDisplayType display_id)
68{
69 ANGLE_SCOPED_GLOBAL_LOCK();
70 FUNC_EVENT("EGLNativeDisplayType display_id = 0x%016" PRIxPTR, (uintptr_t)display_id);
71
72 return egl::Display::GetDisplayFromNativeDisplay(display_id, AttributeMap());
73}
74
75EGLBoolean EGLAPIENTRY EGL_Initialize(EGLDisplay dpy, EGLint *major, EGLint *minor)
76{
77 ANGLE_SCOPED_GLOBAL_LOCK();
78 FUNC_EVENT("EGLDisplay dpy = 0x%016" PRIxPTR ", EGLint *major = 0x%016" PRIxPTR
79 ", EGLint *minor = 0x%016" PRIxPTR,
80 (uintptr_t)dpy, (uintptr_t)major, (uintptr_t)minor);
81 Thread *thread = egl::GetCurrentThread();
82
83 egl::Display *display = static_cast<egl::Display *>(dpy);
84 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, ValidateInitialize(display), "eglInitialize",
85 GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_FALSE);
86
87 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, display->initialize(), "eglInitialize", GetDisplayIfValid(display),
88 EGL_FALSE);
89
90 if (major)
91 *major = 1;
92 if (minor)
93 *minor = 5;
94
95 thread->setSuccess();
96 return EGL_TRUE;
97}
98
99EGLBoolean EGLAPIENTRY EGL_Terminate(EGLDisplay dpy)
100{
101 ANGLE_SCOPED_GLOBAL_LOCK();
102 FUNC_EVENT("EGLDisplay dpy = 0x%016" PRIxPTR, (uintptr_t)dpy);
103 Thread *thread = egl::GetCurrentThread();
104
105 egl::Display *display = static_cast<egl::Display *>(dpy);
106 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, ValidateTerminate(display), "eglTerminate",
107 GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_FALSE);
108 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, display->prepareForCall(), "eglTerminate",
109 GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_FALSE);
110 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread,
111 display->makeCurrent(thread->getContext(), nullptr, nullptr, nullptr),
112 "eglTerminate", GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_FALSE);
113 SetContextCurrent(thread, nullptr);
114 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, display->terminate(thread), "eglTerminate",
115 GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_FALSE);
116
117 thread->setSuccess();
118 return EGL_TRUE;
119}
120
121const char *EGLAPIENTRY EGL_QueryString(EGLDisplay dpy, EGLint name)
122{
123 ANGLE_SCOPED_GLOBAL_LOCK();
124 FUNC_EVENT("EGLDisplay dpy = 0x%016" PRIxPTR ", EGLint name = %d", (uintptr_t)dpy, name);
125 Thread *thread = egl::GetCurrentThread();
126
127 egl::Display *display = static_cast<egl::Display *>(dpy);
128 if (!(display == EGL_NO_DISPLAY && name == EGL_EXTENSIONS))
129 {
130 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, ValidateDisplay(display), "eglQueryString",
131 GetDisplayIfValid(display), nullptr);
132 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, display->prepareForCall(), "eglQueryString",
133 GetDisplayIfValid(display), nullptr);
134 }
135
136 const char *result;
137 switch (name)
138 {
139 case EGL_CLIENT_APIS:
140 result = "OpenGL_ES";
141 break;
142 case EGL_EXTENSIONS:
143 if (display == EGL_NO_DISPLAY)
144 {
145 result = egl::Display::GetClientExtensionString().c_str();
146 }
147 else
148 {
149 result = display->getExtensionString().c_str();
150 }
151 break;
152 case EGL_VENDOR:
153 result = display->getVendorString().c_str();
154 break;
155 case EGL_VERSION:
156 result = "1.5 (ANGLE " ANGLE_VERSION_STRING ")";
157 break;
158 default:
159 thread->setError(EglBadParameter(), GetDebug(), "eglQueryString",
160 GetDisplayIfValid(display));
161 return nullptr;
162 }
163
164 thread->setSuccess();
165 return result;
166}
167
168EGLBoolean EGLAPIENTRY EGL_GetConfigs(EGLDisplay dpy,
169 EGLConfig *configs,
170 EGLint config_size,
171 EGLint *num_config)
172{
173 ANGLE_SCOPED_GLOBAL_LOCK();
174 FUNC_EVENT("EGLDisplay dpy = 0x%016" PRIxPTR ", EGLConfig *configs = 0x%016" PRIxPTR
175 ", "
176 "EGLint config_size = %d, EGLint *num_config = 0x%016" PRIxPTR,
177 (uintptr_t)dpy, (uintptr_t)configs, config_size, (uintptr_t)num_config);
178 Thread *thread = egl::GetCurrentThread();
179
180 egl::Display *display = static_cast<egl::Display *>(dpy);
181
182 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, ValidateGetConfigs(display, config_size, num_config),
183 "eglGetConfigs", GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_FALSE);
184
185 ClipConfigs(display->getConfigs(AttributeMap()), configs, config_size, num_config);
186
187 thread->setSuccess();
188 return EGL_TRUE;
189}
190
191EGLBoolean EGLAPIENTRY EGL_ChooseConfig(EGLDisplay dpy,
192 const EGLint *attrib_list,
193 EGLConfig *configs,
194 EGLint config_size,
195 EGLint *num_config)
196{
197 ANGLE_SCOPED_GLOBAL_LOCK();
198 FUNC_EVENT("EGLDisplay dpy = 0x%016" PRIxPTR ", const EGLint *attrib_list = 0x%016" PRIxPTR
199 ", "
200 "EGLConfig *configs = 0x%016" PRIxPTR
201 ", EGLint config_size = %d, EGLint *num_config = 0x%016" PRIxPTR,
202 (uintptr_t)dpy, (uintptr_t)attrib_list, (uintptr_t)configs, config_size,
203 (uintptr_t)num_config);
204 Thread *thread = egl::GetCurrentThread();
205
206 egl::Display *display = static_cast<egl::Display *>(dpy);
207 AttributeMap attribMap = AttributeMap::CreateFromIntArray(attrib_list);
208
209 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, ValidateChooseConfig(display, attribMap, config_size, num_config),
210 "eglChooseConfig", GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_FALSE);
211
212 ClipConfigs(display->chooseConfig(attribMap), configs, config_size, num_config);
213
214 thread->setSuccess();
215 return EGL_TRUE;
216}
217
218EGLBoolean EGLAPIENTRY EGL_GetConfigAttrib(EGLDisplay dpy,
219 EGLConfig config,
220 EGLint attribute,
221 EGLint *value)
222{
223 ANGLE_SCOPED_GLOBAL_LOCK();
224 FUNC_EVENT("EGLDisplay dpy = 0x%016" PRIxPTR ", EGLConfig config = 0x%016" PRIxPTR
225 ", EGLint attribute = %d, EGLint "
226 "*value = 0x%016" PRIxPTR,
227 (uintptr_t)dpy, (uintptr_t)config, attribute, (uintptr_t)value);
228 Thread *thread = egl::GetCurrentThread();
229
230 egl::Display *display = static_cast<egl::Display *>(dpy);
231 Config *configuration = static_cast<Config *>(config);
232
233 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, ValidateGetConfigAttrib(display, configuration, attribute),
234 "eglGetConfigAttrib", GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_FALSE);
235
236 QueryConfigAttrib(configuration, attribute, value);
237
238 thread->setSuccess();
239 return EGL_TRUE;
240}
241
242EGLSurface EGLAPIENTRY EGL_CreateWindowSurface(EGLDisplay dpy,
243 EGLConfig config,
244 EGLNativeWindowType win,
245 const EGLint *attrib_list)
246{
247 ANGLE_SCOPED_GLOBAL_LOCK();
248 FUNC_EVENT("EGLDisplay dpy = 0x%016" PRIxPTR ", EGLConfig config = 0x%016" PRIxPTR
249 ", EGLNativeWindowType win = 0x%016" PRIxPTR
250 ", "
251 "const EGLint *attrib_list = 0x%016" PRIxPTR,
252 (uintptr_t)dpy, (uintptr_t)config, (uintptr_t)win, (uintptr_t)attrib_list);
253 Thread *thread = egl::GetCurrentThread();
254
255 egl::Display *display = static_cast<egl::Display *>(dpy);
256 Config *configuration = static_cast<Config *>(config);
257 AttributeMap attributes = AttributeMap::CreateFromIntArray(attrib_list);
258
259 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread,
260 ValidateCreateWindowSurface(display, configuration, win, attributes),
261 "eglCreateWindowSurface", GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_NO_SURFACE);
262 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, display->prepareForCall(), "eglCreateWindowSurface",
263 GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_NO_SURFACE);
264
265 egl::Surface *surface = nullptr;
266 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread,
267 display->createWindowSurface(configuration, win, attributes, &surface),
268 "eglCreateWindowSurface", GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_NO_SURFACE);
269
270 return static_cast<EGLSurface>(surface);
271}
272
273EGLSurface EGLAPIENTRY EGL_CreatePbufferSurface(EGLDisplay dpy,
274 EGLConfig config,
275 const EGLint *attrib_list)
276{
277 ANGLE_SCOPED_GLOBAL_LOCK();
278 FUNC_EVENT("EGLDisplay dpy = 0x%016" PRIxPTR ", EGLConfig config = 0x%016" PRIxPTR
279 ", const EGLint *attrib_list = "
280 "0x%016" PRIxPTR,
281 (uintptr_t)dpy, (uintptr_t)config, (uintptr_t)attrib_list);
282 Thread *thread = egl::GetCurrentThread();
283
284 egl::Display *display = static_cast<egl::Display *>(dpy);
285 Config *configuration = static_cast<Config *>(config);
286 AttributeMap attributes = AttributeMap::CreateFromIntArray(attrib_list);
287
288 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, ValidateCreatePbufferSurface(display, configuration, attributes),
289 "eglCreatePbufferSurface", GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_NO_SURFACE);
290 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, display->prepareForCall(), "eglCreatePbufferSurface",
291 GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_NO_SURFACE);
292 egl::Surface *surface = nullptr;
293 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, display->createPbufferSurface(configuration, attributes, &surface),
294 "eglCreatePbufferSurface", GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_NO_SURFACE);
295
296 return static_cast<EGLSurface>(surface);
297}

299EGLSurface EGLAPIENTRY EGL_CreatePixmapSurface(EGLDisplay dpy,
300 EGLConfig config,
301 EGLNativePixmapType pixmap,
302 const EGLint *attrib_list)
303{
304 ANGLE_SCOPED_GLOBAL_LOCK();
305 FUNC_EVENT("EGLDisplay dpy = 0x%016" PRIxPTR ", EGLConfig config = 0x%016" PRIxPTR
306 ", EGLNativePixmapType pixmap = "
307 "0x%016" PRIxPTR
308 ", "
309 "const EGLint *attrib_list = 0x%016" PRIxPTR,
310 (uintptr_t)dpy, (uintptr_t)config, (uintptr_t)pixmap, (uintptr_t)attrib_list);
311 Thread *thread = egl::GetCurrentThread();
312
313 egl::Display *display = static_cast<egl::Display *>(dpy);
314 Config *configuration = static_cast<Config *>(config);
315 AttributeMap attributes = AttributeMap::CreateFromIntArray(attrib_list);
316
317 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread,
318 ValidateCreatePixmapSurface(display, configuration, pixmap, attributes),
319 "eglCreatePixmapSurface", GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_NO_SURFACE);
320 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, display->prepareForCall(), "eglCreatePixmapSurface",
321 GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_NO_SURFACE);
322 egl::Surface *surface = nullptr;
323 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread,
324 display->createPixmapSurface(configuration, pixmap, attributes, &surface),
325 "eglCreatePixmapSurface", GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_NO_SURFACE);
326
327 thread->setSuccess();
328 return static_cast<EGLSurface>(surface);
329}
330
331EGLBoolean EGLAPIENTRY EGL_DestroySurface(EGLDisplay dpy, EGLSurface surface)
332{
333 ANGLE_SCOPED_GLOBAL_LOCK();
334 FUNC_EVENT("EGLDisplay dpy = 0x%016" PRIxPTR ", EGLSurface surface = 0x%016" PRIxPTR,
335 (uintptr_t)dpy, (uintptr_t)surface);
336 Thread *thread = egl::GetCurrentThread();
337
338 egl::Display *display = static_cast<egl::Display *>(dpy);
339 Surface *eglSurface = static_cast<Surface *>(surface);
340
341 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, ValidateDestroySurface(display, eglSurface, surface),
342 "eglDestroySurface", GetSurfaceIfValid(display, eglSurface), EGL_FALSE);
343 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, display->prepareForCall(), "eglDestroySurface",
344 GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_FALSE);
345 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, display->destroySurface(eglSurface), "eglDestroySurface",
346 GetSurfaceIfValid(display, eglSurface), EGL_FALSE);
347
348 thread->setSuccess();
349 return EGL_TRUE;
350}
351
352EGLBoolean EGLAPIENTRY EGL_QuerySurface(EGLDisplay dpy,
353 EGLSurface surface,
354 EGLint attribute,
355 EGLint *value)
356{
357 ANGLE_SCOPED_GLOBAL_LOCK();
358 FUNC_EVENT("EGLDisplay dpy = 0x%016" PRIxPTR ", EGLSurface surface = 0x%016" PRIxPTR
359 ", EGLint attribute = %d, EGLint "
360 "*value = 0x%016" PRIxPTR,
361 (uintptr_t)dpy, (uintptr_t)surface, attribute, (uintptr_t)value);
362 Thread *thread = egl::GetCurrentThread();
363
364 egl::Display *display = static_cast<egl::Display *>(dpy);
365 const Surface *eglSurface = static_cast<const Surface *>(surface);
366
367 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, ValidateQuerySurface(display, eglSurface, attribute, value),
368 "eglQuerySurface", GetSurfaceIfValid(display, eglSurface), EGL_FALSE);
369 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, display->prepareForCall(), "eglQuerySurface",
370 GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_FALSE);
371 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, QuerySurfaceAttrib(display, eglSurface, attribute, value),
372 "eglQuerySurface", GetSurfaceIfValid(display, eglSurface), EGL_FALSE);
373
374 thread->setSuccess();
375 return EGL_TRUE;
376}
377
378EGLContext EGLAPIENTRY EGL_CreateContext(EGLDisplay dpy,
379 EGLConfig config,
380 EGLContext share_context,
381 const EGLint *attrib_list)
382{
383 ANGLE_SCOPED_GLOBAL_LOCK();
384 FUNC_EVENT("EGLDisplay dpy = 0x%016" PRIxPTR ", EGLConfig config = 0x%016" PRIxPTR
385 ", EGLContext share_context = %d, "
386 "const EGLint *attrib_list = 0x%016" PRIxPTR,
387 (uintptr_t)dpy, (uintptr_t)config, CID(dpy, share_context), (uintptr_t)attrib_list);
388 Thread *thread = egl::GetCurrentThread();
389
390 egl::Display *display = static_cast<egl::Display *>(dpy);
391 Config *configuration = static_cast<Config *>(config);
392 gl::Context *sharedGLContext = static_cast<gl::Context *>(share_context);
393 AttributeMap attributes = AttributeMap::CreateFromIntArray(attrib_list);
394
395 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread,
396 ValidateCreateContext(display, configuration, sharedGLContext, attributes),
397 "eglCreateContext", GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_NO_CONTEXT);
398 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, display->prepareForCall(), "eglCreateContext",
399 GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_NO_CONTEXT);
400 gl::Context *context = nullptr;
401 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread,
402 display->createContext(configuration, sharedGLContext, thread->getAPI(),
403 attributes, &context),
404 "eglCreateContext", GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_NO_CONTEXT);
405
406 thread->setSuccess();
407 return static_cast<EGLContext>(context);
408}
409
410EGLBoolean EGLAPIENTRY EGL_DestroyContext(EGLDisplay dpy, EGLContext ctx)
411{
412 ANGLE_SCOPED_GLOBAL_LOCK();
413 FUNC_EVENT("EGLDisplay dpy = 0x%016" PRIxPTR ", EGLContext ctx = %d", (uintptr_t)dpy,
414 CID(dpy, ctx));
415 Thread *thread = egl::GetCurrentThread();
416
417 egl::Display *display = static_cast<egl::Display *>(dpy);
418 gl::Context *context = static_cast<gl::Context *>(ctx);
419
420 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, ValidateDestroyContext(display, context, ctx), "eglDestroyContext",
421 GetContextIfValid(display, context), EGL_FALSE);
422 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, display->prepareForCall(), "eglDestroyContext",
423 GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_FALSE);
424 bool contextWasCurrent = context == thread->getContext();
425
426 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, display->destroyContext(thread, context), "eglDestroyContext",
427 GetContextIfValid(display, context), EGL_FALSE);
428
429 if (contextWasCurrent)
430 {
431 SetContextCurrent(thread, nullptr);
432 }
433
434 thread->setSuccess();
435 return EGL_TRUE;
436}
437
438EGLBoolean EGLAPIENTRY EGL_MakeCurrent(EGLDisplay dpy,
439 EGLSurface draw,
440 EGLSurface read,
441 EGLContext ctx)
442{
443 ANGLE_SCOPED_GLOBAL_LOCK();
444 FUNC_EVENT("EGLDisplay dpy = 0x%016" PRIxPTR ", EGLSurface draw = 0x%016" PRIxPTR
445 ", EGLSurface read = 0x%016" PRIxPTR
446 ", "
447 "EGLContext ctx = %d",
448 (uintptr_t)dpy, (uintptr_t)draw, (uintptr_t)read, CID(dpy, ctx));
449 Thread *thread = egl::GetCurrentThread();
450
451 egl::Display *display = static_cast<egl::Display *>(dpy);
452 Surface *drawSurface = static_cast<Surface *>(draw);
453 Surface *readSurface = static_cast<Surface *>(read);
454 gl::Context *context = static_cast<gl::Context *>(ctx);
455
456 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, ValidateMakeCurrent(display, drawSurface, readSurface, context),
457 "eglMakeCurrent", GetContextIfValid(display, context), EGL_FALSE);
458 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, display->prepareForCall(), "eglMakeCurrent",
459 GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_FALSE);
460 Surface *previousDraw = thread->getCurrentDrawSurface();
461 Surface *previousRead = thread->getCurrentReadSurface();
462 gl::Context *previousContext = thread->getContext();
463
464 // Only call makeCurrent if the context or surfaces have changed.
465 if (previousDraw != drawSurface || previousRead != readSurface || previousContext != context)
466 {
467 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread,
468 display->makeCurrent(thread, drawSurface, readSurface, context),
469 "eglMakeCurrent", GetContextIfValid(display, context), EGL_FALSE);
470
471 SetContextCurrent(thread, context);
472 }
473
474 thread->setSuccess();
475 return EGL_TRUE;
476}
477
478EGLSurface EGLAPIENTRY EGL_GetCurrentSurface(EGLint readdraw)
479{
480 ANGLE_SCOPED_GLOBAL_LOCK();
481 FUNC_EVENT("EGLint readdraw = %d", readdraw);
482 Thread *thread = egl::GetCurrentThread();
483
484 if (readdraw == EGL_READ)
485 {
486 thread->setSuccess();
487 return thread->getCurrentReadSurface();
488 }
489 else if (readdraw == EGL_DRAW)
490 {
491 thread->setSuccess();
492 return thread->getCurrentDrawSurface();
493 }
494 else
495 {
496 thread->setError(EglBadParameter(), GetDebug(), "eglGetCurrentSurface", nullptr);
497 return EGL_NO_SURFACE;
498 }
499}
500
501EGLDisplay EGLAPIENTRY EGL_GetCurrentDisplay(void)
502{
503 ANGLE_SCOPED_GLOBAL_LOCK();
504 EVENT(nullptr, gl::EntryPoint::Begin, __FUNCTION__, "");
505 Thread *thread = egl::GetCurrentThread();
506
507 thread->setSuccess();
508 if (thread->getContext() != nullptr)
509 {
510 return thread->getContext()->getDisplay();
511 }
512 return EGL_NO_DISPLAY;
513}
514
515EGLBoolean EGLAPIENTRY EGL_QueryContext(EGLDisplay dpy,
516 EGLContext ctx,
517 EGLint attribute,
518 EGLint *value)
519{
520 ANGLE_SCOPED_GLOBAL_LOCK();
521 FUNC_EVENT("EGLDisplay dpy = 0x%016" PRIxPTR
522 ", EGLContext ctx = %d"
523 ", EGLint attribute = %d, EGLint *value "
524 "= 0x%016" PRIxPTR,
525 (uintptr_t)dpy, CID(dpy, ctx), attribute, (uintptr_t)value);
526 Thread *thread = egl::GetCurrentThread();
527
528 egl::Display *display = static_cast<egl::Display *>(dpy);
529 gl::Context *context = static_cast<gl::Context *>(ctx);
530
531 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, ValidateQueryContext(display, context, attribute, value),
532 "eglQueryContext", GetContextIfValid(display, context), EGL_FALSE);
533 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, display->prepareForCall(), "eglQueryContext",
534 GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_FALSE);
535 QueryContextAttrib(context, attribute, value);
536
537 thread->setSuccess();
538 return EGL_TRUE;
539}
540
541EGLBoolean EGLAPIENTRY EGL_WaitGL(void)
542{
543 ANGLE_SCOPED_GLOBAL_LOCK();
544 EVENT(nullptr, gl::EntryPoint::Begin, __FUNCTION__, "");
545 Thread *thread = egl::GetCurrentThread();
546
547 egl::Display *display = thread->getDisplay();
548
549 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, ValidateDisplay(display), "eglWaitGL", GetDisplayIfValid(display),
550 EGL_FALSE);
551 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, display->prepareForCall(), "eglWaitGL", GetDisplayIfValid(display),
552 EGL_FALSE);
553
554 // eglWaitGL like calling eglWaitClient with the OpenGL ES API bound. Since we only implement
555 // OpenGL ES we can do the call directly.
556 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, display->waitClient(thread->getContext()), "eglWaitGL",
557 GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_FALSE);
558
559 thread->setSuccess();
560 return EGL_TRUE;
561}
562
563EGLBoolean EGLAPIENTRY EGL_WaitNative(EGLint engine)
564{
565 ANGLE_SCOPED_GLOBAL_LOCK();
566 FUNC_EVENT("EGLint engine = %d", engine);
567 Thread *thread = egl::GetCurrentThread();
568
569 egl::Display *display = thread->getDisplay();
570
571 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, ValidateWaitNative(display, engine), "eglWaitNative",
572 GetThreadIfValid(thread), EGL_FALSE);
573 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, display->prepareForCall(), "eglWaitNative",
574 GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_FALSE);
575
576 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, display->waitNative(thread->getContext(), engine), "eglWaitNative",
577 GetThreadIfValid(thread), EGL_FALSE);
578
579 thread->setSuccess();
580 return EGL_TRUE;
581}
582
583EGLBoolean EGLAPIENTRY EGL_SwapBuffers(EGLDisplay dpy, EGLSurface surface)
584{
585 ANGLE_SCOPED_GLOBAL_LOCK();
586 FUNC_EVENT("EGLDisplay dpy = 0x%016" PRIxPTR ", EGLSurface surface = 0x%016" PRIxPTR,
587 (uintptr_t)dpy, (uintptr_t)surface);
588 Thread *thread = egl::GetCurrentThread();
589
590 egl::Display *display = static_cast<egl::Display *>(dpy);
591 Surface *eglSurface = (Surface *)surface;
592
593 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, ValidateSwapBuffers(thread, display, eglSurface), "eglSwapBuffers",
594 GetSurfaceIfValid(display, eglSurface), EGL_FALSE);
595 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, display->prepareForCall(), "eglSwapBuffers",
596 GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_FALSE);
597
598 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, eglSurface->swap(thread->getContext()), "eglSwapBuffers",
599 GetSurfaceIfValid(display, eglSurface), EGL_FALSE);
600
601 thread->setSuccess();
602 return EGL_TRUE;
603}
604
605EGLBoolean EGLAPIENTRY EGL_CopyBuffers(EGLDisplay dpy,
606 EGLSurface surface,
607 EGLNativePixmapType target)
608{
609 ANGLE_SCOPED_GLOBAL_LOCK();
610 FUNC_EVENT("EGLDisplay dpy = 0x%016" PRIxPTR ", EGLSurface surface = 0x%016" PRIxPTR
611 ", EGLNativePixmapType target = "
612 "0x%016" PRIxPTR,
613 (uintptr_t)dpy, (uintptr_t)surface, (uintptr_t)target);
614 Thread *thread = egl::GetCurrentThread();
615
616 egl::Display *display = static_cast<egl::Display *>(dpy);
617 Surface *eglSurface = static_cast<Surface *>(surface);
618
619 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, ValidateCopyBuffers(display, eglSurface), "eglCopyBuffers",
620 GetSurfaceIfValid(display, eglSurface), EGL_FALSE);
621 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, display->prepareForCall(), "eglCopyBuffers",
622 GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_FALSE);
623 UNIMPLEMENTED(); // FIXME
624
625 thread->setSuccess();
626 return 0;
627}
628
629// EGL 1.1
630EGLBoolean EGLAPIENTRY EGL_BindTexImage(EGLDisplay dpy, EGLSurface surface, EGLint buffer)
631{
632 ANGLE_SCOPED_GLOBAL_LOCK();
633 FUNC_EVENT("EGLDisplay dpy = 0x%016" PRIxPTR ", EGLSurface surface = 0x%016" PRIxPTR
634 ", EGLint buffer = %d",
635 (uintptr_t)dpy, (uintptr_t)surface, buffer);
636 Thread *thread = egl::GetCurrentThread();
637
638 egl::Display *display = static_cast<egl::Display *>(dpy);
639 Surface *eglSurface = static_cast<Surface *>(surface);
640 gl::Context *context = thread->getContext();
641 gl::Texture *textureObject = nullptr;
642
643 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(
644 thread, ValidateBindTexImage(display, eglSurface, surface, buffer, context, &textureObject),
645 "eglBindTexImage", GetSurfaceIfValid(display, eglSurface), EGL_FALSE);
646 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, display->prepareForCall(), "eglBindTexImage",
647 GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_FALSE);
648 if (context)
649 {
650 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, eglSurface->bindTexImage(context, textureObject, buffer),
651 "eglBindTexImage", GetSurfaceIfValid(display, eglSurface), EGL_FALSE);
652 }
653
654 thread->setSuccess();
655 return EGL_TRUE;
656}
657
658EGLBoolean EGLAPIENTRY EGL_SurfaceAttrib(EGLDisplay dpy,
659 EGLSurface surface,
660 EGLint attribute,
661 EGLint value)
662{
663 ANGLE_SCOPED_GLOBAL_LOCK();
664 FUNC_EVENT("EGLDisplay dpy = 0x%016" PRIxPTR ", EGLSurface surface = 0x%016" PRIxPTR
665 ", EGLint attribute = %d, EGLint "
666 "value = %d",
667 (uintptr_t)dpy, (uintptr_t)surface, attribute, value);
668 Thread *thread = egl::GetCurrentThread();
669
670 egl::Display *display = static_cast<egl::Display *>(dpy);
671 Surface *eglSurface = static_cast<Surface *>(surface);
672
673 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, ValidateSurfaceAttrib(display, eglSurface, attribute, value),
674 "eglSurfaceAttrib", GetSurfaceIfValid(display, eglSurface), EGL_FALSE);
675 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, display->prepareForCall(), "eglSurfaceAttrib",
676 GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_FALSE);
677 SetSurfaceAttrib(eglSurface, attribute, value);
678
679 thread->setSuccess();
680 return EGL_TRUE;
681}
682
683EGLBoolean EGLAPIENTRY EGL_ReleaseTexImage(EGLDisplay dpy, EGLSurface surface, EGLint buffer)
684{
685 ANGLE_SCOPED_GLOBAL_LOCK();
686 FUNC_EVENT("EGLDisplay dpy = 0x%016" PRIxPTR ", EGLSurface surface = 0x%016" PRIxPTR
687 ", EGLint buffer = %d",
688 (uintptr_t)dpy, (uintptr_t)surface, buffer);
689 Thread *thread = egl::GetCurrentThread();
690
691 egl::Display *display = static_cast<egl::Display *>(dpy);
692 Surface *eglSurface = static_cast<Surface *>(surface);
693
694 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, ValidateReleaseTexImage(display, eglSurface, surface, buffer),
695 "eglReleaseTexImage", GetSurfaceIfValid(display, eglSurface), EGL_FALSE);
696
697 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, display->prepareForCall(), "eglReleaseTexImage",
698 GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_FALSE);
699 gl::Texture *texture = eglSurface->getBoundTexture();
700
701 if (texture)
702 {
703 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, eglSurface->releaseTexImage(thread->getContext(), buffer),
704 "eglReleaseTexImage", GetSurfaceIfValid(display, eglSurface),
705 EGL_FALSE);
706 }
707
708 thread->setSuccess();
709 return EGL_TRUE;
710}
711
712EGLBoolean EGLAPIENTRY EGL_SwapInterval(EGLDisplay dpy, EGLint interval)
713{
714 ANGLE_SCOPED_GLOBAL_LOCK();
715 FUNC_EVENT("EGLDisplay dpy = 0x%016" PRIxPTR ", EGLint interval = %d", (uintptr_t)dpy,
716 interval);
717 Thread *thread = egl::GetCurrentThread();
718 gl::Context *context = thread->getContext();
719
720 egl::Display *display = static_cast<egl::Display *>(dpy);
721 Surface *draw_surface = static_cast<Surface *>(thread->getCurrentDrawSurface());
722
723 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, ValidateSwapInterval(display, draw_surface, context),
724 "eglSwapInterval", GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_FALSE);
725 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, display->prepareForCall(), "eglSwapInterval",
726 GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_FALSE);
727 const egl::Config *surfaceConfig = draw_surface->getConfig();
728 EGLint clampedInterval = std::min(std::max(interval, surfaceConfig->minSwapInterval),
729 surfaceConfig->maxSwapInterval);
730
731 draw_surface->setSwapInterval(clampedInterval);
732
733 thread->setSuccess();
734 return EGL_TRUE;
735}
736
737// EGL 1.2
738EGLBoolean EGLAPIENTRY EGL_BindAPI(EGLenum api)
739{
740 ANGLE_SCOPED_GLOBAL_LOCK();
741 FUNC_EVENT("EGLenum api = 0x%X", api);
742 Thread *thread = egl::GetCurrentThread();
743
744 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, ValidateBindAPI(api), "eglBindAPI", GetThreadIfValid(thread),
745 EGL_FALSE);
746
747 thread->setAPI(api);
748
749 thread->setSuccess();
750 return EGL_TRUE;
751}
752
753EGLenum EGLAPIENTRY EGL_QueryAPI(void)
754{
755 ANGLE_SCOPED_GLOBAL_LOCK();
756 EVENT(nullptr, gl::EntryPoint::Begin, __FUNCTION__, "");
757 Thread *thread = egl::GetCurrentThread();
758
759 EGLenum API = thread->getAPI();
760
761 thread->setSuccess();
762 return API;
763}

765EGLSurface EGLAPIENTRY EGL_CreatePbufferFromClientBuffer(EGLDisplay dpy,
766 EGLenum buftype,
767 EGLClientBuffer buffer,
768 EGLConfig config,
769 const EGLint *attrib_list)
770{
771 ANGLE_SCOPED_GLOBAL_LOCK();
772 FUNC_EVENT("EGLDisplay dpy = 0x%016" PRIxPTR
773 ", EGLenum buftype = 0x%X, EGLClientBuffer buffer = 0x%016" PRIxPTR
774 ", "
775 "EGLConfig config = 0x%016" PRIxPTR ", const EGLint *attrib_list = 0x%016" PRIxPTR,
776 (uintptr_t)dpy, buftype, (uintptr_t)buffer, (uintptr_t)config,
777 (uintptr_t)attrib_list);
778 Thread *thread = egl::GetCurrentThread();
779
780 egl::Display *display = static_cast<egl::Display *>(dpy);
781 Config *configuration = static_cast<Config *>(config);
782 AttributeMap attributes = AttributeMap::CreateFromIntArray(attrib_list);
783
784 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(
785 thread,
786 ValidateCreatePbufferFromClientBuffer(display, buftype, buffer, configuration, attributes),
787 "eglCreatePbufferFromClientBuffer", GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_NO_SURFACE);
788 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, display->prepareForCall(), "eglCreatePbufferFromClientBuffer",
789 GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_NO_SURFACE);
790 egl::Surface *surface = nullptr;
791 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread,
792 display->createPbufferFromClientBuffer(configuration, buftype, buffer,
793 attributes, &surface),
794 "eglCreatePbufferFromClientBuffer", GetDisplayIfValid(display),
795 EGL_NO_SURFACE);
796
797 return static_cast<EGLSurface>(surface);
798}
799
800EGLBoolean EGLAPIENTRY EGL_ReleaseThread(void)
801{
802 ANGLE_SCOPED_GLOBAL_LOCK();
803 EVENT(nullptr, gl::EntryPoint::Begin, __FUNCTION__, "");
804 Thread *thread = egl::GetCurrentThread();
805
806 Surface *previousDraw = thread->getCurrentDrawSurface();
807 Surface *previousRead = thread->getCurrentReadSurface();
808 gl::Context *previousContext = thread->getContext();
809 egl::Display *previousDisplay = thread->getDisplay();
810
811 if (previousDisplay != EGL_NO_DISPLAY)
812 {
813 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, previousDisplay->prepareForCall(), "eglReleaseThread",
814 GetDisplayIfValid(previousDisplay), EGL_FALSE);
815 // Only call makeCurrent if the context or surfaces have changed.
816 if (previousDraw != EGL_NO_SURFACE || previousRead != EGL_NO_SURFACE ||
817 previousContext != EGL_NO_CONTEXT)
818 {
819 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread,
820 previousDisplay->makeCurrent(thread, nullptr, nullptr, nullptr),
821 "eglReleaseThread", nullptr, EGL_FALSE);
822 }
823 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, previousDisplay->releaseThread(), "eglReleaseThread",
824 GetDisplayIfValid(previousDisplay), EGL_FALSE);
825 SetContextCurrent(thread, nullptr);
826 }
827
828 thread->setSuccess();
829 return EGL_TRUE;
830}
831
832EGLBoolean EGLAPIENTRY EGL_WaitClient(void)
833{
834 ANGLE_SCOPED_GLOBAL_LOCK();
835 EVENT(nullptr, gl::EntryPoint::Begin, __FUNCTION__, "");
836 Thread *thread = egl::GetCurrentThread();
837
838 egl::Display *display = thread->getDisplay();
839 gl::Context *context = thread->getContext();
840
841 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, ValidateDisplay(display), "eglWaitClient",
842 GetContextIfValid(display, context), EGL_FALSE);
843 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, display->prepareForCall(), "eglWaitClient",
844 GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_FALSE);
845 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, display->waitClient(context), "eglWaitClient",
846 GetContextIfValid(display, context), EGL_FALSE);
847
848 thread->setSuccess();
849 return EGL_TRUE;
850}
851
852// EGL 1.4
853EGLContext EGLAPIENTRY EGL_GetCurrentContext(void)
854{
855 ANGLE_SCOPED_GLOBAL_LOCK();
856 EVENT(nullptr, gl::EntryPoint::Begin, __FUNCTION__, "");
857 Thread *thread = egl::GetCurrentThread();
858
859 gl::Context *context = thread->getContext();
860
861 thread->setSuccess();
862 return static_cast<EGLContext>(context);
863}
864
865// EGL 1.5
866EGLSync EGLAPIENTRY EGL_CreateSync(EGLDisplay dpy, EGLenum type, const EGLAttrib *attrib_list)
867{
868 ANGLE_SCOPED_GLOBAL_LOCK();
869 FUNC_EVENT("EGLDisplay dpy = 0x%016" PRIxPTR
870 ", EGLenum type = 0x%X, const EGLint* attrib_list = 0x%016" PRIxPTR,
871 (uintptr_t)dpy, type, (uintptr_t)attrib_list);
872
873 Thread *thread = egl::GetCurrentThread();
874 egl::Display *display = static_cast<egl::Display *>(dpy);
875 AttributeMap attributes = AttributeMap::CreateFromAttribArray(attrib_list);
876
877 gl::Context *currentContext = thread->getContext();
878 egl::Display *currentDisplay = currentContext ? currentContext->getDisplay() : nullptr;
879
880 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(
881 thread, ValidateCreateSync(display, type, attributes, currentDisplay, currentContext),
882 "eglCreateSync", GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_NO_SYNC);
883 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, display->prepareForCall(), "eglCreateSync",
884 GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_FALSE);
885 egl::Sync *syncObject = nullptr;
886 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, display->createSync(currentContext, type, attributes, &syncObject),
887 "eglCreateSync", GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_NO_SYNC);
888
889 thread->setSuccess();
890 return static_cast<EGLSync>(syncObject);
891}
892
893EGLBoolean EGLAPIENTRY EGL_DestroySync(EGLDisplay dpy, EGLSync sync)
894{
895 ANGLE_SCOPED_GLOBAL_LOCK();
896 FUNC_EVENT("EGLDisplay dpy = 0x%016" PRIxPTR ", EGLSync sync = 0x%016" PRIxPTR, (uintptr_t)dpy,
897 (uintptr_t)sync);
898
899 Thread *thread = egl::GetCurrentThread();
900 egl::Display *display = static_cast<egl::Display *>(dpy);
901 egl::Sync *syncObject = static_cast<Sync *>(sync);
902
903 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, ValidateDestroySync(display, syncObject), "eglDestroySync",
904 GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_FALSE);
905 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, display->prepareForCall(), "eglDestroySync",
906 GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_FALSE);
907 display->destroySync(syncObject);
908
909 thread->setSuccess();
910 return EGL_TRUE;
911}
912
913EGLint EGLAPIENTRY EGL_ClientWaitSync(EGLDisplay dpy, EGLSync sync, EGLint flags, EGLTime timeout)
914{
915 ANGLE_SCOPED_GLOBAL_LOCK();
916 FUNC_EVENT("EGLDisplay dpy = 0x%016" PRIxPTR ", EGLSync sync = 0x%016" PRIxPTR
917 ", EGLint flags = 0x%X, EGLTime timeout = "
918 "%llu",
919 (uintptr_t)dpy, (uintptr_t)sync, flags, static_cast<unsigned long long>(timeout));
920
921 Thread *thread = egl::GetCurrentThread();
922 egl::Display *display = static_cast<egl::Display *>(dpy);
923 egl::Sync *syncObject = static_cast<Sync *>(sync);
924
925 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, ValidateClientWaitSync(display, syncObject, flags, timeout),
926 "eglClientWaitSync", GetSyncIfValid(display, syncObject), EGL_FALSE);
927 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, display->prepareForCall(), "eglClientWaitSync",
928 GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_FALSE);
929 gl::Context *currentContext = thread->getContext();
930 EGLint syncStatus = EGL_FALSE;
931 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(
932 thread, syncObject->clientWait(display, currentContext, flags, timeout, &syncStatus),
933 "eglClientWaitSync", GetSyncIfValid(display, syncObject), EGL_FALSE);
934
935 thread->setSuccess();
936 return syncStatus;
937}
938
939EGLBoolean EGLAPIENTRY EGL_GetSyncAttrib(EGLDisplay dpy,
940 EGLSync sync,
941 EGLint attribute,
942 EGLAttrib *value)
943{
944 ANGLE_SCOPED_GLOBAL_LOCK();
945 FUNC_EVENT("EGLDisplay dpy = 0x%016" PRIxPTR ", EGLSync sync = 0x%016" PRIxPTR
946 ", EGLint attribute = 0x%X, EGLAttrib "
947 "*value = 0x%016" PRIxPTR,
948 (uintptr_t)dpy, (uintptr_t)sync, attribute, (uintptr_t)value);
949
950 Thread *thread = egl::GetCurrentThread();
951 egl::Display *display = static_cast<egl::Display *>(dpy);
952 egl::Sync *syncObject = static_cast<Sync *>(sync);
953
954 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, ValidateGetSyncAttrib(display, syncObject, attribute, value),
955 "eglGetSyncAttrib", GetSyncIfValid(display, syncObject), EGL_FALSE);
956
957 EGLint valueExt;
958 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, GetSyncAttrib(display, syncObject, attribute, &valueExt),
959 "eglGetSyncAttrib", GetSyncIfValid(display, syncObject), EGL_FALSE);
960 *value = valueExt;
961
962 thread->setSuccess();
963 return EGL_TRUE;
964}
965
966EGLImage EGLAPIENTRY EGL_CreateImage(EGLDisplay dpy,
967 EGLContext ctx,
968 EGLenum target,
969 EGLClientBuffer buffer,
970 const EGLAttrib *attrib_list)
971{
972 ANGLE_SCOPED_GLOBAL_LOCK();
973 FUNC_EVENT("EGLDisplay dpy = 0x%016" PRIxPTR
974 ", EGLContext ctx = %d"
975 ", EGLenum target = 0x%X, "
976 "EGLClientBuffer buffer = 0x%016" PRIxPTR
977 ", const EGLAttrib *attrib_list = 0x%016" PRIxPTR,
978 (uintptr_t)dpy, CID(dpy, ctx), target, (uintptr_t)buffer, (uintptr_t)attrib_list);
979 Thread *thread = egl::GetCurrentThread();
980
981 egl::Display *display = static_cast<egl::Display *>(dpy);
982 gl::Context *context = static_cast<gl::Context *>(ctx);
983 AttributeMap attributes = AttributeMap::CreateFromIntArray((const EGLint *)attrib_list);
984
985 Error error = ValidateCreateImage(display, context, target, buffer, attributes);
986 if (error.isError())
987 {
988 thread->setError(error, GetDebug(), "eglCreateImage", GetDisplayIfValid(display));
989 return EGL_NO_IMAGE;
990 }
991 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, display->prepareForCall(), "eglCreateImage",
992 GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_FALSE);
993
994 Image *image = nullptr;
995 error = display->createImage(context, target, buffer, attributes, &image);
996 if (error.isError())
997 {
998 thread->setError(error, GetDebug(), "eglCreateImage", GetDisplayIfValid(display));
999 return EGL_NO_IMAGE;
1000 }
1001
1002 thread->setSuccess();
1003 return static_cast<EGLImage>(image);
1004}
1005
1006EGLBoolean EGLAPIENTRY EGL_DestroyImage(EGLDisplay dpy, EGLImage image)
1007{
1008 ANGLE_SCOPED_GLOBAL_LOCK();
1009 FUNC_EVENT("EGLDisplay dpy = 0x%016" PRIxPTR ", EGLImage image = 0x%016" PRIxPTR,
1010 (uintptr_t)dpy, (uintptr_t)image);
1011 Thread *thread = egl::GetCurrentThread();
1012 egl::Display *display = static_cast<egl::Display *>(dpy);
1013 Image *img = static_cast<Image *>(image);
1014
1015 Error error = ValidateDestroyImage(display, img);
1016 if (error.isError())
1017 {
1018 thread->setError(error, GetDebug(), "eglDestroyImage", GetImageIfValid(display, img));
1019 return EGL_FALSE;
1020 }
1021 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, display->prepareForCall(), "eglDestroyImage",
1022 GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_FALSE);
1023 display->destroyImage(img);
1024
1025 thread->setSuccess();
1026 return EGL_TRUE;
1027}
1028
1029EGLDisplay EGLAPIENTRY EGL_GetPlatformDisplay(EGLenum platform,
1030 void *native_display,
1031 const EGLAttrib *attrib_list)
1032{
1033 ANGLE_SCOPED_GLOBAL_LOCK();
1034 FUNC_EVENT("EGLenum platform = %d, void* native_display = 0x%016" PRIxPTR
1035 ", const EGLint* attrib_list = "
1036 "0x%016" PRIxPTR,
1037 platform, (uintptr_t)native_display, (uintptr_t)attrib_list);
1038 Thread *thread = egl::GetCurrentThread();
1039
1040 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, ValidateGetPlatformDisplay(platform, native_display, attrib_list),
1041 "eglGetPlatformDisplay", GetThreadIfValid(thread), EGL_NO_DISPLAY);
1042
1043 const auto &attribMap = AttributeMap::CreateFromAttribArray(attrib_list);
1044 if (platform == EGL_PLATFORM_ANGLE_ANGLE)
1045 {
1046 return egl::Display::GetDisplayFromNativeDisplay(
1047 gl::bitCast<EGLNativeDisplayType>(native_display), attribMap);
1048 }
1049 else if (platform == EGL_PLATFORM_DEVICE_EXT)
1050 {
1051 Device *eglDevice = static_cast<Device *>(native_display);
1052 return egl::Display::GetDisplayFromDevice(eglDevice, attribMap);
1053 }
1054 else
1055 {
1056 UNREACHABLE();
1057 return EGL_NO_DISPLAY;
1058 }
1059}
1060
1061EGLSurface EGLAPIENTRY EGL_CreatePlatformWindowSurface(EGLDisplay dpy,
1062 EGLConfig config,
1063 void *native_window,
1064 const EGLAttrib *attrib_list)
1065{
1066 ANGLE_SCOPED_GLOBAL_LOCK();
1067 FUNC_EVENT("EGLDisplay dpy = 0x%016" PRIxPTR ", EGLConfig config = 0x%016" PRIxPTR
1068 ", void* native_window = 0x%016" PRIxPTR
1069 ", "
1070 "const EGLint* attrib_list = 0x%016" PRIxPTR,
1071 (uintptr_t)dpy, (uintptr_t)config, (uintptr_t)native_window, (uintptr_t)attrib_list);
1072
1073 Thread *thread = egl::GetCurrentThread();
1074 egl::Display *display = static_cast<egl::Display *>(dpy);
1075
1076 Config *configuration = static_cast<Config *>(config);
1077 // Use reinterpret_cast since native_window could be a pointer or an actual value.
1078 EGLNativeWindowType win = reinterpret_cast<EGLNativeWindowType>(native_window);
1079 AttributeMap attributes = AttributeMap::CreateFromAttribArray(attrib_list);
1080
1081 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(
1082 thread, ValidateCreateWindowSurface(display, configuration, win, attributes),
1083 "eglPlatformCreateWindowSurface", GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_NO_SURFACE);
1084 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, display->prepareForCall(), "eglCreateWindowSurface",
1085 GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_NO_SURFACE);
1086 egl::Surface *surface = nullptr;
1087 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(
1088 thread, display->createWindowSurface(configuration, win, attributes, &surface),
1089 "eglPlatformCreateWindowSurface", GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_NO_SURFACE);
1090
1091 return static_cast<EGLSurface>(surface);
1092}

1094EGLSurface EGLAPIENTRY EGL_CreatePlatformPixmapSurface(EGLDisplay dpy,
1095 EGLConfig config,
1096 void *native_pixmap,
1097 const EGLAttrib *attrib_list)
1098{
1099 ANGLE_SCOPED_GLOBAL_LOCK();
1100 FUNC_EVENT("EGLDisplay dpy = 0x%016" PRIxPTR ", EGLConfig config = 0x%016" PRIxPTR
1101 ", void* native_pixmap = 0x%016" PRIxPTR
1102 ", "
1103 "const EGLint* attrib_list = 0x%016" PRIxPTR,
1104 (uintptr_t)dpy, (uintptr_t)config, (uintptr_t)native_pixmap, (uintptr_t)attrib_list);
1105 Thread *thread = egl::GetCurrentThread();
1106
1107 egl::Display *display = static_cast<egl::Display *>(dpy);
1108 Config *configuration = static_cast<Config *>(config);
1109 // Use reinterpret_cast since native_window could be a pointer or an actual value.
1110 EGLNativePixmapType pixmap = reinterpret_cast<EGLNativePixmapType>(native_pixmap);
1111 AttributeMap attributes = AttributeMap::CreateFromAttribArray(attrib_list);
1112
1113 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(
1114 thread, ValidateCreatePixmapSurface(display, configuration, pixmap, attributes),
1115 "eglCreatePlatformPixmapSurface", GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_NO_SURFACE);
1116 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, display->prepareForCall(), "eglCreatePlatformPixmapSurface",
1117 GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_NO_SURFACE);
1118 egl::Surface *surface = nullptr;
1119 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(
1120 thread, display->createPixmapSurface(configuration, pixmap, attributes, &surface),
1121 "eglCreatePlatformPixmapSurface", GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_NO_SURFACE);
1122
1123 thread->setSuccess();
1124 return static_cast<EGLSurface>(surface);
1125}
1126
1127EGLBoolean EGLAPIENTRY EGL_WaitSync(EGLDisplay dpy, EGLSync sync, EGLint flags)
1128{
1129 ANGLE_SCOPED_GLOBAL_LOCK();
1130 FUNC_EVENT("EGLDisplay dpy =0x%016" PRIxPTR "p, EGLSync sync = 0x%016" PRIxPTR
1131 ", EGLint flags = 0x%X",
1132 (uintptr_t)dpy, (uintptr_t)sync, flags);
1133
1134 Thread *thread = egl::GetCurrentThread();
1135 egl::Display *display = static_cast<egl::Display *>(dpy);
1136 gl::Context *context = thread->getContext();
1137 egl::Sync *syncObject = static_cast<Sync *>(sync);
1138
1139 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, ValidateWaitSync(display, context, syncObject, flags),
1140 "eglWaitSync", GetSyncIfValid(display, syncObject), EGL_FALSE);
1141 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, display->prepareForCall(), "eglWaitSync",
1142 GetDisplayIfValid(display), EGL_FALSE);
1143 gl::Context *currentContext = thread->getContext();
1144 ANGLE_EGL_TRY_RETURN(thread, syncObject->serverWait(display, currentContext, flags),
1145 "eglWaitSync", GetSyncIfValid(display, syncObject), EGL_FALSE);
1146
1147 thread->setSuccess();
1148 return EGL_TRUE;
1149}
1150
1151__eglMustCastToProperFunctionPointerType EGLAPIENTRY EGL_GetProcAddress(const char *procname)
1152{
1153 ANGLE_SCOPED_GLOBAL_LOCK();
1154 FUNC_EVENT("const char *procname = \"%s\"", procname);
1155 Thread *thread = egl::GetCurrentThread();
1156
1157 const ProcEntry *entry =
1158 std::lower_bound(&g_procTable[0], &g_procTable[g_numProcs], procname, CompareProc);
1159
1160 thread->setSuccess();
1161
1162 if (entry == &g_procTable[g_numProcs] || strcmp(entry->first, procname) != 0)
1163 {
1164 return nullptr;
1165 }
1166
1167 return entry->second;
1168}
1169} // extern "C"
